post.author: Min-Soo Kim
post.content:
>
>>저같은 학생 또는 초보자가쓸때 Enterprise Architect 와 Enterprise Developer 중 어떤것이 나을까요?  둘의 차이점을 간단히 설명 해 주세요.
>
>Both of them are for serious enterprise development and would not be relevant to you. I would recommend the Professional instead.
>
>In summary, the Enterprise Developer adds the capabilities for effective team development, and the Architect adds analysis and design tools. So both of these tools may rather distract you from learning .NET.
>
>They offer a license option for students so do some research on it to see how much discount you can get.

충고 감사합니다. 저도 오늘 저희 학교에 있는 컴퓨터 가게에서 물어봤더니 Professional 을 권하더라구요. 가격은 $159 정도.
필요하신분 가서 구입하세요 학생증 검사 안하니까. ^^
post.title: [re] Visual Studio .NET 2003 에 대한 질문
